articles.description: Priyanka Chopra has talked about her thought process as a new parent. The actor welcomed a baby girl with husband Nick Jonas in January.
articles.content: Priyanka Chopra has opened up about what all goes through her mind as a new parent. The actor and her singer-actor husband Nick Jonas welcomed a baby girl in January this year. The child was born via… [+1661 chars]
